sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Higher Education Veterans Service Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Higher Education Veterans Service Act.

sections.heading: Definitions.    For purposes of this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. For purposes of this Act:

sections.heading: Survey; coordinator; best practices report; best efforts.
sections.text: Survey; coordinator; best practices report; best efforts.

sections.heading: Expenditure reporting. Each October 15, each public college and university shall report to the Board of Higher Education, in collaboration with the Illinois Community College Board, on the expenditures for the prior fiscal year for the programs and services related to the efforts of the public colle
sections.text: Expenditure reporting. Each October 15, each public college and university shall report to the Board of Higher Education, in collaboration with the Illinois Community College Board, on the expenditures for the prior fiscal year for the programs and services related to the efforts of the public college or university in attracting, recruiting, and retaining veterans and military personnel.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
